name: Spanish Garlic Soup
author: Judy Bialek
summary: This recipe for garlic soup was given to my Spanish class by the instructor, it's very yummy!
ingredients: 1 head garlic, peeled and lightly crushed
directions: Heat oil in a large saucepan over medium heat
Stir in garlic and cook until lightly browned, about 5 minutes
Pour in 1 cup of chicken stock, cover, and allow to simmer until the garlic is soft, about 10 minutes
Mash the garlic with a fork into a coarse paste
Pour in remaining chicken stock, increase heat to medium-high, and bring to a boil
Stir in carrots and cook for 1 minute, then add red pepper and continue cooking until vegetables are tender
Season to taste with salt and pepper before serving
